description: [``botocore``] This release adds the Image Workflows feature to give more flexibility and control over the image building and testing process.
[``botocore``] This release 1)  adds sub-municipality field in Places API for searching and getting places information, and 2) allows optimizing route calculation based on expected arrival time.
[``botocore``] This release introduces the StartLiveTail API to tail ingested logs in near real time.
